ygData.subject: Re: odd lore item
ygData.msgSnippet: yep, it s a low lvl quest given by nusk treton in the academy of arcane sciences in freeport... not sure what the quest gives, most likely cash, faction, and
ygData.messageBody:
yep, it's a low lvl quest given by nusk treton in the academy of arcane sciences in freeport... not sure what the quest gives, most likely cash, faction, and exp...

Fetko, lvl 26 wizzie, Mith Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: Neil Lambert
To: EQ_Wizards
Sent: Saturday, June 26, 1999 1:48 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] odd lore item


i was at the docks of freeport waiting for the boat when i started swimming around... i saw a shark and decided "what the hell... i'll kill it" so i did... i looted it, and there was nothing on it, but then, when the corpse dissapeared i noticed a bag on the ocean floor, i picked it up and it was a "locked chest" and it was a lore item... didn't know what to make of it so i used the identify spell on it... it says it's an Ebon mask shipment.... anyone know what it's for? quest?
